ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 7
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/12/99 1:08:21 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... for ... I am not sure that gsay itself is required.  But close proximity is required. Gsay is
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/12/99 1:08:21 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
auradracul@... writes:

> Tried this..didn't work...you have to be in a group and use the group tell
> AND your skill has to be better than the person that you are speaking to
for
> them to get any language skills out of it.

I am not sure that gsay itself is required. But close proximity is required.
Gsay is just polite... since you will be saying gibberish to most. Every
time Verant has said how to learn languages, it has always been "if you are
near somoene speeking another language you will pick it up" so close
proximity is the key. And groups tend to stay together.

Sonoroud.
